A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The first half is really lame\, and both halves of the script are abysmal\, but the second half is pretty good. Lots of cool new aliens\, and teh Rey/Ren stuff is the best thing Disney's done since buying Pixar. Too much Finn\, again; not enough Poe\, again. But overall it's not bad for a Star Wars movie post 1980.
